name: fs-ai-tools
description: A bag of tools for AI flightplans and .cfg files

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg._ShowCleanA.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg._ShowCleanA.markdownDescription: Adds the "Clean Aircraft.cfg" function to the context menu when an `aircraft.cfg` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnuse.title: Remove unused lines
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnuse.markdownDescription: Removes the lines defined in *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.removeUnusedLinesItems#`* from the fltsim entries.
List of entry settings to be removed. • `key=value` for distinct values, `key=*` for any non-empty value, `key=_` for only empty values, `key` for all values.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.renumber.title: Renumber
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.renumber.markdownDescription: Renumber the `fltsim` entries in sequence, starting at `0`.

fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortPropert.title: Sort Properties Order
fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortPropert.markdownDescription: Defines the sort order of the `fltsim` entries' properties. Only applicable if `#fs-ai-tools.cleanAircraftCfg.sortProperties#` is active. Usage: `first>second>third>…`. Undefined keys are appended at the end.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan._ShowCleanFl.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan._ShowCleanFl.markdownDescription: Adds the "Clean Flightplan" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.title: Leading zeroes flightnumbers
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.markdownDescription: Pads the flightnumbers to 4 digits with zeroes (e.g. `12` becomes `0012`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.title: Leading zeroes flight levels
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.leadingZeroe.markdownDescription: Pads the flight levels to 3 digits with zeroes (e.g. `70` becomes `070`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.removeSecond.title: Remove seconds
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.removeSecond.markdownDescription: Removes seconds from arrival and departure times (e.g. `12:34:56` becomes `12:34`).

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentages
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: Randomizes the flightplans' percentages to values between the `min` and `max` set.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentage min
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: If *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercentages#`* is activated, this will be the min value.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.title: Randomize percentage max
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercen.markdownDescription: If *`#fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.randomPercentages#`* is activated, this will be the max value.

fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.changeAirpor.title: Change Airport Codes
fs-ai-tools.cleanFlightplan.changeAirpor.markdownDescription: Changes each occurrence of the old airport code to the new one. Format: "OldICAO:NewICAO". Leave empty for no airport changes.

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft._ShowCreateAi.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.createAircraft._ShowCreateAi.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create aircraft" function to the context menu when text is selected.

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft.copyTextureCf.markdownDescription: If a `texture.cfg` file exists in the aircraft folder, copy it to the newly created texture folders.

fs-ai-tools.createAircraft.copyTitlesToC.markdownDescription: Copy the titles of the created fltsim entries to the clipboard.

enumDescriptions: Always creates the texture folders in the template's directory
Never creates the texture folders in the template's directory
You will be asked during the data input process if the texture folders should be created

fs-ai-tools.showChangeAircraftNumberInCo.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showChangeAircraftNumberInCo.markdownDescription: Adds the "Change Aircraft Number" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.showCountAircraftInContextMe.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showCountAircraftInContextMe.markdownDescription: Adds the "Count Aircraft" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.showCreateAifpCfgInContextMe.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showCreateAifpCfgInContextMe.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create aifp.cfg" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.showCreateFlightplanHeaderIn.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showCreateFlightplanHeaderIn.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create Flightplan Header" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.showCreateFlightplanHeaderFr.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showCreateFlightplanHeaderFr.markdownDescription: Adds the "Create Flightplan Header from aifp.cfg" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.showRebaseAircraftNumbersInC.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showRebaseAircraftNumbersInC.markdownDescription: Adds the "Rebase AC#s" function to the context menu when a `Flightplan….txt` file is open and text has been selected.

fs-ai-tools.showRenumberAddOnsCfgInConte.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showRenumberAddOnsCfgInConte.markdownDescription: Adds the "Renumber" function to the context menu when a `add-ons.cfg` file is open.

fs-ai-tools.showRenumberSceneryCfgInCont.title: Add to Context Menu
fs-ai-tools.showRenumberSceneryCfgInCont.markdownDescription: Adds the "Renumber" function to the context menu when a `scenery.cfg` file is open.
